import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import img1 from '../../../assets/img/room-suite/homestead-apt-1.jpg'; const apartmentspost = [ { img: img1, title: 'Livewell Suite', text: '1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, Queen Bed, Fully Furnished · 900 Sq Ft', utilities: 'Water Included • Electric & Cooking Gas: Pay-As-You-Go for Max Savings', furnishings: [ 'Queen Bed with Frame', 'Dresser & Nightstand', 'Couch & Coffee Table', 'Dining Table with 2 Chairs', 'Smart TVs & Soundysystem', 'Desk & Ergonomic Chair', 'Kitchen Essentials', 'and more...', ], price: '4000', period: 'Month' }, ]; class Facilities extends Component { render() { return (
Now Leasing

Current Offering

{apartmentspost.length === 1 ? (

{apartmentspost[0].title}

{apartmentspost[0].text}

{apartmentspost[0].utilities}

{apartmentspost[0].furnishings}

${apartmentspost[0].price}/{apartmentspost[0].period}
) : ( apartmentspost.map((item, i) => (
{i === 0 ? ( ) : ( )}

{item.title}

{item.text}

{item.utilities}

${item.price}/{item.period}
)) )}
); } } export default Facilities;
